channel.title: Memory Forensics on MMOX
channel.description: Recent content in Memory Forensics on MMOX

item.title: Let's Defend - Wanna Story
item.description: Description We hired a full stack developer but seems he faked all his experience and he is just lazy developer and got attacked by a weird ransomware can you investigate what happened ? Questions Q1: What is the bitcoin wallet address that the hacker left Q2: What is the SHA256 of the Ransomware Q3: What is the full URL that downloaded the ransomware? Q4: What function executed the ransomware? Q5: What is the extension of the ransomware?
